location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Account of the succession of Jaswant Singh II, Maharaja of Jodhpur

mods.abstract: Account, most likely written by either Doctor James William Moore, Doctor to the Rajputana [Rājasthān] Agency, or Major Charles Kenneth Walter, Political Agent for Jaipur describing the introduction of Jaswant Singh II as the new Maharaja of Jodhpur 3 March 1873 to his Court, local Chiefs and citizens of Jodhpur.The account includes details of the clothes worn by the Maharaja and his sons; the ceremony in which he acceded to the throne as Maharja; the reception by the Maharaja of his Chiefs, military regiments and the Political Agent; and the celebrations to commemorate the accession.
